diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Perforated appendicitis with an associated intraabdominal abscess
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain for 9 days, initially periumbilical, with intermittent nausea and emesis. A CT scan revealed a complex fluid collection in the RLQ consistent with an abscess and a dilated, hyperemic appendix, supporting the diagnosis of perforated appendicitis.
